ygData.subject: Re: Which sites I use for what.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I check a few sites every day or so. Here are mine... http://everquest.allakhazam.com - I
ygData.messageBody:
Well I check a few sites every day or so. Here
are mine...<br><br><a href=http://everquest.allakhazam.com target=new>http://everquest.allakhazam.com</a> -
I still think Allakhazam has done a spectacular job
with his site. It's so comprehensive it's sick. It's
even got a listing of items for pp auction by
server.<br><br><a href=http://www.phoenixdragoons.com target=new>http://www.phoenixdragoons.com</a> - This is a guild I should be joining shortly,
based on Prexus. Cool people and great layout, plus
quite a bit of useful information, including a great
jewelry diagram.<br><br><a href=http://eqx.simplenet.com target=new>http://eqx.simplenet.com</a> - I'm
not sure if that's the exact address; it's Everquest
Express, an EQ newspaper. Great editorials and good
comics. Also very funny
Q&As.<br><br><a href=http://www.prexus.com target=new>http://www.prexus.com</a> - My server's site. Mostly use the forums. Able
to get a LoW for dirt cheap from
here.<br><br><a href=http://www.eqvault.com target=new>http://www.eqvault.com</a> - Packed with news and information. Also has
current listings of how crowded the servers are. Plus a
daily screenshot feature.<br><br>Those are the ones I
usually check out. They're all pretty good,
IMHO.<br><br>Iskandar<br>Half elf warrior of 20 seasons<br>Prexus
